name: Pamela (DaRealMrPickles)
description:
Something's wrong...

Where did it come from? Why is it here? What does it want?

Pamela is a short survival horror game made in Unreal Engine 4. Developed by me, "DaRealMrPickles". Try to survive and discover the story that is hidden here.

I tried to make the game very gameplay focused as I feel many horror games do not focus much on the actual "playing the game" part. Let me know what you think and also be sure to report any bugs/issues.

Thanks! <3
